spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified as "High-Energy & Intense" with a score of 0.9 due to the metadata indicating a high-intensity session. Terms like "race off at high rhythms" and "accumulate maximum meters" suggest a focus on speed and endurance at a maximum rhythm of 34, which aligns with intense and vigorous efforts. The intensity level of 3 out of 3 further supports this spirit.

The "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is assigned a score of 0.7, as the visual data shows rowing taking place on a river with natural surroundings, fitting the theme of environmental challenge and exploration.

Finally, "Flow & Rhythm" receives a score of 0.5. While the primary focus is intensity, the mention of "high rhythms" and the music list, featuring energetic and rhythmic pop songs, suggest elements of a coordinated, music-driven experience.

Other spirits like "Soothing & Restorative" and "Structured & Disciplined" are excluded due to lack of recovery focus and explicit training protocols. "Sport & Agility" is also less relevant in this context.
